description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A war has broken out, deep underground, a Holy War...between Moles!  Battle as 1 of 5 fanatical moles, tunnel your way to victory through 24 hazard filled levels. A fight for up to 4 players, friends or CPU. Use Power-Ups, win Awards and destroy your enemies in an effort to be the last mole standing.
